Class PrincessLeia

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityInterface, SWEntityInterface, SWForceEntityInterface

    public class PrincessLeia
extends SWLegend
    General 'Princess' Leia Organa. The General of the rebel alliance - also Lukes twin brother, who will be waiting on the Death Star in hopes of a rescue from her twin brother!
    Author:
    jas, mewc

      • getPrincessLeia

        public static PrincessLeia getPrincessLeia(MessageRenderer m,
                                           SWWorld world,
                                           Direction[] moves)
        getPrincessLeia() method Implements a new Leia Organa to the world - and activates the SWLegend into the SWWorld map.
        Parameters:
        m - - Messagerenderer used for displaying messages to output.
        world - - SWWorld that Leia will be placed in
        moves - - The Direction array that Leia will follow in his Patrol (set in constructor)
        Returns:
        leia - The SWLegend PrincessLeia that is created
